title: Miss Fisher's Melbourne: Before and After Visual Effects
brief_description: This short work shows how digital special effects are employed to capture ‘before’ and ‘after’ shots to make 2015 Melbourne appear as 1920s Melbourne. These have been produced for ‘Behind the Scenes’ of the series produced by Every Cloud Productions shown on ABC television ‘Miss Fisher’s Murder Mysteries’.
